explanationInfo.message:
Click to enter the reference answer (required) 
 1. English only, up to 2000 words 
 2. More overlap with the scenario description and context and more answers (5+) listed, the better. Use | to separate each answer 
 3. Open test score is based on the quality of pronunciation and the relevance of content

explanationInfo1.message: Student cannot see the text and the system will mark based on this text. The text and pronunciation must be exactly the same. For example, 1996 should be written as nineteen ninety six. Chinese characters are not supported.

logoutTip.message: You have a question that has not been saved, are you sure to quit?

markRuleTip.message: Oral English scoring component compares the input text with the user's pronunciation, and it grades according to the user's pronunciation. At present, three scoring methods are supported: words/sentences/paragraphs. Among them, the maximum duration of word scoring is 20s, the maximum duration of sentence scoring is 40s, and the maximum duration of paragraph scoring is 180s. After reaching time limit and if the user has’nt reading out, the read part will be scored automatically. Please pay attention to the number of text entered. The default passingscore of the system is 60 marks. System will show green colored marks when eceeding 60 marks. When lesser than 60 marks, system will show red colored marks.

meansAnswersCorrectly.message: Indicates that the answer to this option is correct.

meansAnswersError.message: Indicates that this option is incorrect. Wrong answer.

meansAnswersMissed.message: Indicates that this option is the correct answer, but it is missing.

reportEditTip.message: Suggestions for instructional design: According to the initial learning objectives, after the teaching content is finished, you can set the corresponding test questions. On the one hand, it can help learners to strengthen their knowledge in time. On the other hand, according to the final results, it can detect whether the learners have met the requirements of the learning objectives, so that students could review pertinently. The Result Report tool can be added at the end of each unit. You can set up the knowledge points of this unit and the corresponding exercises. System will provide feedback to students on the answer accuracy rate of each knowledge point accordingly.

reportTip.message: Note: This statistics is for reference only. The statistics of the exercise is specified by the course designer. It is not necessarily the exercise of this chapter. It does not represent the final result.

srtShowTips1.message: 1. Subtitles inside video player: Subtitle is displayed at the specified time one by one at the bottom of content area inside video player.

srtShowTips2.message: 2. Subtitles outside video player: All subtitles are displayed in a box next to video player's right side when video is loaded. After the video is viewed completely for the first time, users can click a subtitle to jump to the video content where this subtitle is scheduled.

srtShowTips3.message: 3. Subtitles won't show during the time when quiz/exercise questions are present.

textInputTip.message: Normally, content assessment and the Score Reference Text for grading are the same paragraph text, but when the text contains information such as year, place name and so on, you need to etnert the content that matches the voice pronunciation perfectly in <a href="javascript:;\"class="btn-default oral English-first btntxt">the reference text <a> so as to ensure the maximum accuracy of systemgrading. For example, "I was born in 1998." This sentence contains the number 1998. The scoring system cannot directly judge the pronunciation, so you need to click the "Score Reference Text" button to enter in the new input box: I was born in nineteen ninety eight.

browserTip.message: It was detected that you are using an older version or a browser that is not supported by the system. This will {emphasize}. Please use the system's recommended browser for learning, or upgrade your browser version, mobile phone please download the U.S. Academy APP learning.
browserTip.description: {emphasize} 是强调内容，因为需要进行单独的样式设置，所以会设置插值。插值处的内容是下面的“可能会导致学习记录不准确”

browserTipEm.message: This may result in inaccurate learning records
browserTipEm.description: 上面 browserTip 的插值内容

browserTipList.message: Only the following browsers are supported:

restoreTip1.message: Do not refresh the page if you are recovering a successful learning record that was not saved before...

restoreTip2.message: Note: If a record never recovers successfully, contact customer service. If you need to go back to the player page to continue, click the "Back" button in the upper right corner. If you don't want to pop up a reminder to resume learning records when you enter the player, you can delete the record that failed to recover (warning: Removing the local cache may prevent the recovery of the successful learning record from being recovered).

restoreComplete.message: The learning record has all recovered successfully
